posts.subject: ZeroNet Questions
posts.body:
Hey guys been lurking for a bit since this didn't die for a day. I've been on ZeroNet for a bit and have a Cheeky/MM Archive on here. (http://127.0.0.1:43110/13dkGZ6j31CoX7yGNDz4iPykoDKuUvpXg4/ if you're interested)

Thought if anyone had any questions i could help answer them.

>>f6b0ad84-f788-4b5e-9007-28a2949d3bcc
You could make every board its own individual mergesite. Would mean that people would only need to keep the boards they have added. Also you can cut these into smaller chunks as well. ZeroMe did this a month or so ago

>>c95b50e2-7be4-44b7-8926-c2eb5c4de70e
With how zeronet works you download the entire filesystem for a site and then you have a dbschema to create a local database that the site uses, this gets the json files from everyones user folder and then throws them all into a DB file in the parent directory. If you mute someone (and if the sites removing their files from your pc) those posts should be removed from the database. Mind you it SHOULD (tm). I've done a few sites over the last couple of months on here and when you remove shit, it updates pretty fast.
